Module com.example.umlscd
Package com.example.umlscd.DataAccessLayer.Serializers.UseCaseDiagram

Class UseCaseDiagramSerializer

java.lang.Object
com.example.umlscd.DataAccessLayer.Serializers.UseCaseDiagram.UseCaseDiagramSerializer
public class UseCaseDiagramSerializer extends Object

Use Case Diagram Serializer

The UseCaseDiagramSerializer class provides functionalities to serialize and deserialize UseCaseDiagramManager instances to and from JSON files. It leverages the Jackson ObjectMapper to convert the diagram manager objects into JSON format for saving and to reconstruct them from JSON files when loading. This facilitates interoperability, ease of sharing, and human-readable storage of use case diagrams.

By utilizing JSON serialization, this class ensures that the state of a use case diagram, including its objects and associations, can be persisted and retrieved efficiently. The class supports pretty printing to enhance the readability of the generated JSON files.

Authors: Ahmad Wyne, Wahaj Asif, Muhammad Muneeb

Version: 1.0

Since: 2024-12-03

  • Method Details

    • saveDiagram

      public static void saveDiagram(UseCaseDiagramManager diagramManager, String filePath) throws IOException
      Saves the provided UseCaseDiagramManager instance to a JSON file at the specified file path.

      This method serializes the UseCaseDiagramManager object into JSON format and writes it to the designated file. It utilizes pretty printing to ensure the JSON output is well-formatted and easily readable.

      Example Usage:

       UseCaseDiagramManager manager = new UseCaseDiagramManager();
 // ... populate manager with objects and associations ...
 UseCaseDiagramSerializer.saveDiagram(manager, "diagram.json");
      Parameters:
      diagramManager - The UseCaseDiagramManager instance to be serialized and saved.
      filePath - The file path where the JSON representation of the diagram will be saved.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the writing process.

    • loadDiagram

      public static UseCaseDiagramManager loadDiagram(String filePath) throws IOException
      Loads a UseCaseDiagramManager instance from a JSON file at the specified file path.

      This method reads the JSON file, deserializes its content, and reconstructs the UseCaseDiagramManager object, including all its contained objects and associations. It ensures that the diagram's state is accurately restored from the JSON representation.

      Example Usage:

       UseCaseDiagramManager manager = UseCaseDiagramSerializer.loadDiagram("diagram.json");
 if (manager != null) {
     // ... use the loaded manager ...
 }
      Parameters:
      filePath - The file path from which the JSON representation of the diagram will be read and deserialized.
      Returns:
      The reconstructed UseCaseDiagramManager instance if successful; null otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the reading process or if the JSON is malformed.
